author: Staff Reporter
text: Members of Ooty Round Table 55 and Coonoor Round Table 117 recently conducted a cleanliness drive at the School Mund Forest Area and Gymkhana Club Road Area in The Nilgiris. Around 25 persons including six children from Ooty and Coonoor participated in the drive in which 250 kilograms of plastic bottles, carry bags, and other garbage were collected. The wastes collected were sent to a dump yard for proper disposal. It was part of the Swachh Bharat and Go Green drive projects of the Round Table.
title: Cleanliness drive at School Mund Forest Area
